directions: Spray 8x8-inch glass baking dish with cooking spray. Place potato puffs and drained tomatoes in baking dish. Sprinkle evenly with taco seasoning; toss together.
Bake 25 minutes or until potatoes are golden brown and crisp, turning gently once halfway. Remove from oven; sprinkle with cheese.
ingredients: 1/2 (28 ounce) package Alexia® Crispy Seasoned Potato Puffs
1 (10 ounce) can Ro*Tel® Original Diced Tomatoes & Green Chilies, drained
title: Cheesy Taco Potato Puff Casserole
